subject: Economy
question_en: What is the total area of India in square kilometers?
question_hi: भारत की केंद्रीय यात्रा कितनी किलोमीटर की प्रतिरोधी प्रश्न
explanation_en:
The total geographical area of India is approximately 2,400,000 square kilometers.
Geographical area in square kilometers: 2,400,000
explanation_hi:
भारत की ग्रहणी क्या करने की प्रश्न है
ग्रहणी in square kilometers: 2,400,000

subject: Economy
question_en: Which is India's largest contributor to GDP?
question_hi: भारत का भारत का प्रतिविधि में सरल संविधि का समाधिक प्रतिविधि
explanation_en: India's largest contributor to GDP (Gross Domestic Product) is a combination of all its major sectors, including Industry, Agriculture, and Services.
